summary: A kaleidoscopic journey into the parallel musical universe of cult music festival All Tomorrow's Parties.
cast: Battles|Belle & Sebastian|Grinderman|Dirty Three|Slint|The Octopus Project|Gossip|Animal Collective|Saul Williams|Two Gallants|Lightning Bolt|Mr. Derry|Shellac|The Mars Volta|Yeah Yeah Yeahs|David Cross|Hawk and a Hacksaw|Seasick Steve|Mogwai|The Boredoms|The Stooges|Portishead|Jah Shaka|John Cooper Clarke|Sonic Youth|The GZA|Les Savy Fav|Akron/Family|Patti Smith|Grizzly Bear|Sun Ra|John Peel|Barry Hogan|Verity Sharp|Bat for Lashes|George Eady|Mark Coldham|Adrian McKinney|Roscoe Mitchell|Damo Suzuki|Marty Crandall|Duglas T. Stewart|Jarvis Cocker|Jerry Garcia|Ryan Schrieber|Gene Lee|Layke Anderson|Ira-Wolf Tuton|Fuck Buttons|Nick Cave|Warren Ellis|Micah P. Hinson|Daniel Johnston|Killah Priest|Claire Riordan
title: All Tomorrow's Parties
